WhatsApp.title: WhatsApp Safety Checklist
WhatsApp.description: Secure your WhatsApp communications and privacy.
checklist: Enable Two-Step Verification: Go to Settings > Account > Two-step verification > Enable.
Adjust Privacy Settings: Settings > Account > Privacy. Control who sees your 'Last Seen', 'Profile Photo', 'About', and 'Status'. Set to 'My Contacts' or 'Nobody' for more privacy.
Block Unwanted Contacts: Open chat > Tap contact name > Scroll down > Block.
Report Spam/Abuse: Open chat > Tap contact name > Scroll down > Report.
Review Group Privacy: Settings > Account > Privacy > Groups. Control who can add you to groups.
Disable Live Location Sharing: Settings > Privacy > Live Location. Ensure you're not sharing unnecessarily.
Backup Safely: Settings > Chats > Chat backup. Consider end-to-end encrypted backup or disable if not needed.
Be wary of suspicious links or messages, even from known contacts.

Facebook.title: Facebook Safety Checklist
Facebook.description: Strengthen your Facebook privacy and security.
checklist: Use a Strong, Unique Password and Enable Two-Factor Authentication (2FA).
Review Privacy Settings: Settings & Privacy > Privacy Checkup. Control who sees your posts, profile info, and how people find you.
Limit Who Can Send Friend Requests: Settings & Privacy > Privacy Checkup > How people can find you on Facebook.
Control Tagging and Mentions: Settings & Privacy > Profile and Tagging. Decide who can tag you and who can see tagged posts.
Review Active Sessions: Settings & Privacy > Security and Login > Where you're logged in. Log out of unfamiliar devices.
Turn Off Location Services for the Facebook App on your device.
Be cautious about clicking unfamiliar links or accepting friend requests from strangers.
Report Harassment or Impersonation: Use the reporting tools available on profiles or posts.

Instagram.title: Instagram Safety Checklist
Instagram.description: Protect your photos, videos, and interactions on Instagram.
checklist: Set Your Account to Private: Settings > Privacy > Account Privacy. Only approved followers can see your content.
Control Story Replies and Mentions: Settings > Privacy > Story. Manage who can reply to your stories and mention you.
Manage Direct Messages: Settings > Privacy > Messages. Control who can message you.
Block Unwanted Accounts: Visit profile > Tap three dots > Block. Block and report accounts engaging in harassment.
Remove Followers: For private accounts, you can remove followers who make you uncomfortable.
Use a Strong, Unique Password and Enable Two-Factor Authentication (2FA).
Turn Off Location Services for the Instagram App.
Be careful about sharing personal information in captions or comments.

Twitter/X.title: Twitter/X Safety Checklist
Twitter/X.description: Manage your privacy and interactions on Twitter/X.
checklist: Protect Your Tweets: Settings and privacy > Privacy and safety > Audience and tagging > Protect your Tweets. Makes your profile private.
Review Discoverability: Settings and privacy > Privacy and safety > Discoverability and contacts. Control if others can find you by email or phone number.
Manage Direct Messages: Settings and privacy > Privacy and safety > Direct Messages. Control who can send you DMs.
Block and Mute Accounts: Block users who harass you. Use the Mute feature to hide tweets from accounts without blocking them.
Mute Words and Phrases: Settings and privacy > Privacy and safety > Mute and block > Muted words. Hide specific words or hashtags from your timeline.
Disable Read Receipts in DMs: Settings and privacy > Privacy and safety > Direct Messages > Show read receipts.
Use a Strong, Unique Password and Enable Two-Factor Authentication (2FA).
Be cautious about sharing location or excessive personal details.

TikTok.title: TikTok Safety Checklist
TikTok.description: Keep your TikTok experience safe and private.
checklist: Set Account to Private: Profile > Three lines (top right) > Settings and privacy > Privacy > Private account.
Control Who Can Comment: Settings and privacy > Privacy > Comments. Set to 'Friends' or 'Nobody'.
Manage Duet and Stitch Settings: Settings and privacy > Privacy > Duet / Stitch. Control who can use your videos.
Disable Download of Your Videos: Settings and privacy > Privacy > Downloads. Prevents others from saving your videos.
Filter Comments: Settings and privacy > Privacy > Comment Filters. Filter all comments or filter keywords.
Block Accounts: Visit profile > Tap three dots > Block. Block and report any harassing accounts.
Review Your Following/Follower List regularly.
Use a Strong, Unique Password and Enable Two-Factor Authentication (2FA).
